title: Dictionary
description: A very early project to practice using APIs. The app was built with JS, HTML and CSS. The app allows users to search for a word and returns the definition. This project helped with practising fetching and processing some JSON data.

title: PokemonCatcher
description: Another early project to practice using APIs and my first attempt at using react. The app is very simple with just a button for users to click. Once clicked a random pokemon is fetched and the sprite image is displayed.
